body_html:
Well...I've found that I've added validation_loss to the list of summary tensors and this gets called every save_summaries_secs seconds. Setting summary_op as None in slim.learning.train fixes the problem.

I'm sorry for this false alarm.
body_text:
Well...I've found that I've added validation_loss to the list of summary tensors and this gets called every save_summaries_secs seconds. Setting summary_op as None in slim.learning.train fixes the problem.
I'm sorry for this false alarm.
body:
Well...I've found that I've added `validation_loss` to the list of summary tensors and this gets called every `save_summaries_secs` seconds. Setting `summary_op` as `None` in `slim.learning.train` fixes the problem.

I'm sorry for this false alarm.
